Axway B2B Gateway Interchange
Highly scalable and secure data flow solutions
Axway Interchange is a high performance B2B portal that is used for real-time communications with a large scope of B2B data protocols and managed file transfer. It allows you to connect your business with partners, customers and financial institutions with effective online communities that are reliable and secure. Axway Interchange executes complex data flows that delivers visibility and integration in Cloud and Mobile application enablement to optimize and control the flow of data throughout enterprise.

Key Features and Benefits
  • Flexible partner management and deployment
  • Predefined dynamic integration process
  • Scalability and high performance
  • Provide mapping services
  • Secure B2B connectivity
  • Real-time visibility for business and IT users
  • Transaction and document tracking
  • Community management
  • Unique MFT capabilities
  • Back-end integration

Miracle Expertise in B2B
Miracle Software Systems is a Global Systems Integrator with 20+ years of industry experience providing ERP/BPM (EAI/SOA) /B2B/Digital Experience Technologies across industries globally. We have partnered with Axway to jointly bring enterprise class B2B, EDI and MFT solutions.
With increasing customer demands, organizations find it difficult to choose the right approach for their large community of partners, customers, and suppliers. We have strong technical and functional expertise using Axway Interchange, B2Bi, Mapping Services and TSIM Framework. We also help our customers with Axway product installs and configuration along with upgrade and migration services from other B2B platforms. We can also provide managed services for both on-premise and hosted B2B platforms.
